game.name: The Forge
game.creator: The Forge Community
game.description: Forge is a progression-based Roblox game where players collect resources, craft items, and upgrade their forge to unlock stronger gear and progress further.

mechanics.resource_collection: Players gather resources to use for crafting and upgrades.
mechanics.forging: Forging allows players to create items, tools, or upgrades.
mechanics.upgrades: Upgrades improve efficiency, speed, or unlock new crafting options.
mechanics.progression: Advancing in the game requires optimizing crafting and upgrade choices.

tips: Focus on upgrading your forge early.
Spend resources wisely and avoid unnecessary crafts.
Upgrade efficiency before speed when starting out.
Learn which items give the best progression value.
Be patient and plan your upgrades.
rules: Respect other players and the game environment.
